title: Organizational Culture For Successful Democracy: Participatory Nonprofits That Advance Their Missions, Build Political Community, and Initiate the Evolution of Society
description: Organizational Culture for Successful Democracy is a manifesto for the grassroots of civil society. The groundbreaking research presented reveals how small organizations can become powerful instruments for world betterment and social evolution. Through analysis based on decades of hands-on work and academic research, the author offers a blue print for how the ninety-nine percent can come together to address common needs, build alliances, and spread the values of authentic democracy during an era where the seemly all powerful few dominate the nations of the world and demand austerity for the many.
author: John G. Mentzos
